name: Touhou: Phantasmagoria of Festive Effervescence (東方: 花火映塚 )
name_original: Touhou: Phantasmagoria of Festive Effervescence (東方: 花火映塚 )
description:
Inspired by Touhou 1 and 3, Phantasmagoria of Festive Effervescence is a Fast-Paced Bullet Hell Breakout VS. game!
Experience a single player story mode with support for both English and Japanese!
Play against friends or the CPU in versus mode!
Dynamic gameplay that mixes up the standard breakout formula by allowing you to shoot the ball, obstacles, and send bullets to your opponent!With art by DJThunderHeart: https://twitter.com/DJThunder_HeartWith music by Nephetheus: https://twitter.com/Nephetheus
